acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased on [4 Oct 1962]11 Jan 1971.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two letters from Mary Jane Holmes. The fist, 1888 February 17, was sent to R. Stanley Brainard in answer to a request for an autograph. The second, 1890 February 15, was sent to Harry C. Roehers, answering a request for an autograph, and speaking of being very tired and having much unanswered correspondence. Both letters are 1 p. ALS.
